original_text: Also, think about those people who believed in Christ but they have already died. If dead people do not rise to a new life, those people would have no life with God.
korean_text: 또한 그리스도 안에서 잠자는 자도 망하였으리니

sentences.original_text: If dead people do not rise to a new life
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 죽은 사람들이 새로운 삶으로 부활하지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: those people would have no life with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 하나님과 함께 삶이 없을 것입니다
